pr_title: NPE fix for System VM's start Command

timeline.bodyText: @pavanaravapalli  bootMode compared with boot type. Please check.
timeline.author: sureshanaparti

replies.bodyText:
@sureshanaparti
here the purpose is to have bootMode initialise with default value and utilise it with uefi enabled vmprofile or normal vmprofile validation. however the constant which is used leads to confusion so i have made changes and fixed.
replies.author: pavanaravapalli
